scripts.build-prod: cd ../../firebase-tools && npm run build && cd ../firebase-tests/nextjs-firebase-issue && node ../../firebase-tools/lib/bin/firebase.js emulators:exec 'exit 0'
scripts.deploy: cd ../../firebase-framework-tools && npm run build && cd ../firebase-tests/nextjs-firebase-issue && node ../../firebase-tools/lib/bin/firebase.js deploy
scripts.deploy-pr: cd ../../firebase-frameworks-prs && npm run build && cd ../firebase-tests/nextjs-firebase-issue && node ../../firebase-tools/lib/bin/firebase.js deploy
